attributes.action: Why Johnson and Sunak are still in their posts having lied in parliament.
attributes.additional_details: This country should not have convicted criminals running our beautiful country and who are a threat to democracy.
attributes.background: Have a parliamentary debate as to why Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak are still in their posts having lied in parliament with regards to partygate.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
